description:
The Flandre Scarlet Song Pack featuring only arrangements of "U.N. Owen Was Her?" is out now!
It also includes an exclusive Flandre Scarlet-themed nameplate and emblem badge!

This pack contains the following:

■6 Songs
・Solitary Moon / Yuuhei Satellite
・Bloody Dancin’Party Night ～Squeeze and Pop! ♥ / Akatsuki Records
・Sweetest Paranoia / Amateras Records feat. matsu, Sae Tsukiyama
・Perfect Crime⑥⑥BANG! / AbsoЯute Zero
・Ultimate taste / Para Dot
・bouchonne / .new label

■1 Nameplate / 1 Emblem Badge

■6 Challenge Stages
・Lv.5 Bang♥ (Bloody Dancin’Party Night ～Squeeze and Pop! ♥)
・Lv.6 From the Darkness (Perfect Crime⑥⑥BANG!)
・Lv.7 Promise to Play Again (Solitary Moon)
・Lv.8 Doesn't it Smell Musty? (bouchonne)
・Lv.9 The Hands of Time (Sweetest Paranoia)
・Lv.10 The Ultimate Taste (Ultimate taste)

 * Internet connection required for purchase.
 * Game must be restarted after songs are purchased in order to use them.
name: Flandre Scarlet Music Pack
